{{Lang|'''Ochimusha'''|ja=落武者|ja_rm=Ochimusha}} are [[Common Enemies]] found during the [[Sacred Sakura Cleansing Ritual]] [[World Quest]] series and in the [[Three Realms Gateway Offering]]. They appear as ghostly versions of the [[Kairagi]], and are creatures created by the coalescence of filth that appear as samurai. Their forms are often swayed by the thought and memories of the times.<ref>{{Ref/Quest|Yougou Cleansing}}</ref>

Their behavior in combat are completely identical to that of [[Kairagi]].

==Drops==
{{Drops Table|type=Kairagi}}

==Appearances==
* [[Sacred Sakura Cleansing Ritual]]: All parts
** [[A Strange Story in Konda]], [[Konda Village]] well: an Ochimusha appears with the epithet "Phantom Warrior Beneath the Konda Village Well"
** [[Sacrificial Offering]]: a Mysterious Samurai appears with the epithet "Phantom Warrior of the Abandoned Shrine"
** [[Cleansing Defilement]]: the Ochimusha appear with the epithet "Filth Forced From the Thunder Sakura's Roots"
* Ochimusha may also appear in some [[Time Trial Challenge]]s and [[Sword Hilt]] puzzles
* [[Three Realms Gateway Offering]]
** [[The Bunkoku Enigma]]: A Mysterious Samurai appeared with the epithet "Vengeful Guardian Spirit"

==Trivia==
===Etymology===
* An {{Lang|{{w|ochimusha}}|ja=落武者|ja_rm=ochimusha|ja_tl=fallen warrior}} was a samurai of a defeated army who survived and fled the battlefield, and in some cases sought refuge in villages in the mountains.<ref>Japanese Wiki Corpus: [https://www.japanese-wiki-corpus.org/history/Ochimusha.html Ochimusha]</ref>
